subject: Sexual Health
title: Genetics and Puberty Timing
description: A fast breakdown of Genetics and Puberty Timing for builders.

hook.text: If your mother started puberty early, there is a strong chance you will too. Genetics set the baseline.

buildup.text: Studies of twins show that 50 to 80% of the variation in puberty timing is due to genetic factors.

discovery.text: Researchers have identified over 300 genetic variants linked to the timing of puberty onset.

twist.text: Environment modifies genetics. Nutrition, stress, and chemical exposure can shift puberty timing significantly.

climax.text: Puberty timing is a blend of inherited DNA and the environment in which a child grows up.

punchline.text: Genes load the clock. Environment sets the alarm.

quiz.question: How much of puberty timing variation is genetic?
